page.title: 20LOCAL PUBLIC TRANSPORT 2
page.content: { LOCAL PUBLIC TRANSPORT CONTINUED} (1)THERE IS NO CAR PARK. (2)THERE IS NO FOOTBRIDGE CONNECTING THE 2 PLATFORMS. (3)THE TICKET OFFICES ARE REGULARLY UNMANNED. {KENLEY RAILWAY STATION . Kenley station is situated 1km from Purley.Kenley is a small station which on average is visited by about 80 people per day.Kenley is on the Caterham branch line.Kenley has trouble with tramps and vandalism.The station has few amenities.These are a car-park consisting of 10 spaces,a drab waiting room,a store room,1 public telephone & 1 entrance.One main thing is that it lacks any toilets!!!
